user_input: Apply a function to each element of the pack in order.  This applies the specified function (which must be parametric on the element type) to each element of the pack, from the first element to the last, passing in each element as a borrowed argument.
Write a function that returns True if the type is a half-precision floating point type,either fp16 or bf16.
system_answer:
@always_inline("nodebug")
    fn is_half_float(self) -> Bool: return self.is_float16() or self.is_bfloat16()
